ygData.subject: Re: L46 weapon effectiveness.
ygData.msgSnippet: Even at lvl 20, I don t think that warsong is useful for group work, unless I am in an all caster group, and I don t really care about buffing my teamates.
ygData.messageBody:
Even at lvl 20, I don't think that warsong is useful for group work,
unless I am in an all caster group, and I don't really care about
buffing my teamates. Though in that situation I now use the triple
damage combo with instruments to keep all the baddies taunted on me.
(That is chords, discord and bellow, though I may replace bellow with
binding now that I have it).

WHen I want to melee solo that when warsong is great (and it is great
for that).

In a group, I hope theres somthing better for me to do that buff up my
(pretty pathetic) damage a bit. Even in my two bard group over thw
eeekend, I found better things to do... (He did anthem and the
approprate rhythms, I did binding, hymm, and discord)
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
